cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 12th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 12th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 3 x bunk beds - radiator heating - extra bedding if needed - electronic key access - cubicle storage - all bedding supplied - individual charge point.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Male Dorm
dorms.description: Male dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards. They offer male accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: 4 x bunk beds - radiator heating - extra bedding if needed - electronic key access - cubicle storage - all bedding supplied - individual charge points.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Room contains 2 x king single beds. Radiator heating - Wi-Fi - towels - additional bedding if required - electronic entrance key.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Comfortable king bed (or 2 singles) Radiator heating - electronic entrance keys - towels - wi-fi - extra bedding if required.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
